ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried that, I have my weapon skill up to it s max at 57, but the fighters weapon skill at level 18 is 95.  I can hit green with no problem, blue I do ok
ygData.messageBody:
I tried that, I have my weapon skill up to it's max at 57, but the fighters
weapon skill at level 18 is 95. I can hit green with no problem, blue I do
ok with, and damage is not bad, but when you start moving up to yellow and
red, then high red, odds of hitting and damage go down very fast.

Edywen
Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 1:25 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Wizards


> From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
> All I can offer you now, is get a Runed Totem Staff and whack away. I
> usually do a good 16-19 dmg at level 13. My miss to hit ratio is bad, of
> course, so this is not as good as it sounds.
>
